data.title: Bike rides in Langenthal
data.meta_description: The most beautiful cycle routes and trails Langenthal › Plan, track and save cycling routes ✓ incl. app for bike rides near you ➤ Test now!
data.text:
Welcome to Langenthal, the perfect place for your next bike tour! Whether you're a beginner, advanced or professional, you'll find suitable cycle routes for every level here. Be inspired by the numerous possibilities and explore the area on two wheels!

Cycling tours in Langenthal

In Langenthal itself, a variety of cycle paths through picturesque landscapes and idyllic villages await you. The best place to start your tour is in the city center and follow the well-signposted routes along green meadows and past historic buildings.

Cycling for beginners

A leisurely ride along the Emme cycle path is ideal for beginners. This flat route takes you along the river of the same name through the Emmental and is ideal for getting to know the region.

Challenging cycle routes

Are you looking for a sporting challenge? Then you should make your way towards Napf. The demanding climbs will reward you with breathtaking views over the entire region.

Cycle tour nearby: Aarwangen

Aarwangen is just a short ride from Langenthal and offers more exciting cycle paths. Explore Aarwangen Castle or cycle along the River Aare - there's plenty to discover here!

Other highlights around Langenthal

In addition to the tours mentioned above, there are many other ways to explore the surrounding area by bike. Visit the St. Urban Monastery or make a detour to Burgdorf Castle - it certainly won't be boring here!

Whether you're planning a relaxed family outing or prefer a sporty ride, there's a route to suit everyone in Langenthal. Pack your bike and let yourself be enchanted by this charming region!
